amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding to implement amendments to the Department of Labor Mine Safety and Health Administration regulations dealing with coal dust exposure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to add at the end of the bill a new section prohibiting use of funds in the bill for implementation of amendments to Department of Labor Mine Safety and Health Administration regulations parts 70, 75, and 90 of title 30, Code of Federal Regulations, as proposed on March 6, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 212 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Rahall.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 212 (Roll no. 349).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
